MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH45 postcode area of Peebles. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30pm to disconnect generators and complete final repairs on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15pm on Saturday, 06 March 2021
